alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued April 21 at 11:59AM EDT until April 24 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Walton and Bay County Beaches. * WHEN...Through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Walton and Bay County beaches are flying red flags this morning and observed conditions support a high rip current risk. The pattern is favorable for frequent rip currents through the weekend as strong east to southeast winds prevail over the next few days.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
